title: Multitouch Test
content: Multitouch Test is a simple app for Android to test the touch of your device. It measures and shows how accurate is the touch of your device, how many touches it supports, and there are some options to personalize the exhibition. After starting, just touch in screen with fingers that they will be recognized by the app. In Options Menu, there are 4 items for customization, they are: Colors Lines Numbers Coordinates Density Rings Vibration Watch a video while of its work!
